name: ScubaHoming
description:
Since we are all forced to stay at home, the need of Nature became every day bigger and bigger.

So I decided to create a virtual piece of sea and populating it with some fishes.

At the moment there's nothing... I hope to have something "Playable" this night.

I'm trying to extend this fantastic tutorial: www.youtube.com/watch?v=bqtqltqcQhw
